title: The best Rioter NA !!!
body:
Rioter Merfdiezel, I would like to thank you for the support you gave us at MSI Sao Paulo on April 29... Called Sjokz to take a selfie with me and my friends and gave us an exclusive toast !! Thank you very much !! you are the man !! Best Rioter NA!!


Greetings from Brazil!!!
